name: Equilibrium (kilfeather94)
description:
Developed in Unity, Equilibrium is an immersive third-person RPG stealth shooter, set in a dystopian cyberpunk-themed universe. You play a vigilante that is on a mission to takedown the nefarious Metacorp, using the various weapons and abilities you have at your disposal.

This project was developed as my final year college software project. Online resources were used in order to gain an understanding on how to implement a 3rd person character controller from scratch, as well as aiming mechanics. I then further expanded upon the project by tweaking the gunplay mechanics as well as implementing my own additional features such as a skills system and weapons customization etc.

Cyberpunk City environment created by Manufactura 4K

Unity Plug-ins used:

  • Dialogue System for Unity
  • RAIN AI
  • InControl
